thread.title: Delusional Maxine Waters to @RealDonaldTrump: ‘Get ready for impeachment’
thread.title_full: Delusional Maxine Waters to @RealDonaldTrump: ‘Get ready for impeachment’

author: Greg P.
title: Delusional Maxine Waters to @RealDonaldTrump: ‘Get ready for impeachment’
text:
Delusional Maxine Waters to @RealDonaldTrump: ‘Get ready for impeachment’ Posted at 9:23 am on March 21, 2017 by Greg P. 
Democrat Rep. Maxine Waters has a message for President Donald Trump this morning after yesterday’s hearing with FBI Director James Comey and NSA Director Mike Rogers: “Get ready for impeachment.” Get ready for impeachment. 
— Maxine Waters (@MaxineWaters) March 21, 2017 
And: My takeaways: Donald Trump is a liar & the FBI Director still has no credibility. He needs to also explain HIS interference in the election. 
— Maxine Waters (@MaxineWaters) March 21, 2017 Trending Delusional Maxine Waters to @RealDonaldTrump: 'Get ready for impeachment' 
Earlier, Waters blasted Comey in a statement, saying that he “bears some responsibility, along with the Russians, in adding to the confusion and misinformation campaign that led to the election of Donald Trump: Read my full statement on today's House Intelligence Committee hearing on Russian active measures during the 2016 election. pic.twitter.com/V4cpvFmkS3 
— Maxine Waters (@MaxineWaters) March 21, 2017 
Dems are naturally excited at her rhetoric: 
— Mark Yesilevskiy (@MarkWhyy) March 21, 2017 from god's mouth to god's ears https://t.co/ijcPboYS4C 
— marisa kabas (@MarisaKabas) March 21, 2017 Oh, we're ready https://t.co/oVJMuB6KFq 
— By Common Consent (@ByCommonConsent) March 21, 2017 We doin this? Cuz I'm ready https://t.co/Y8qm9uk30A 
— Black Girl Nerds (@BlackGirlNerds) March 21, 2017 
Good luck with that, guys. As long as the GOP has the majority, it’s not happening. 
***
